means: 不爱做家务的，不习惯家庭生活的，未驯服的（动物）

sentence.Network_en: After years of marriage he remained essentially undomesticated.
sentence.Network_cn: 结婚多年以后,他实际上依然不爱做家务.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... undocumented 未公开的 undomesticated 不爱做家务的 undone 未完成的.
...把自己边缘化(marginal)，不接受习惯文化的驯服(undomesticated)，所以在思考问题时就如同旅人，很容易对事物作出反应，并以 …
社会工作专业英语词汇(U) ... undoing mechanism 解脱机制 undomesticated 不适应家庭生活的 undue 过度的.
少女与房子&nbsp;_丁朝阳_新浪博客... ... semidome n. [建] 半圆形屋顶 undomesticated adj. 不爱做家务的；未驯服的 my 我的.

list.abs: undomesticated or feral domestic horse ., 非驯养或野生的驯马.

sentences.sentence: "after years of marriage he remained essentially undomesticated"

auth_sentence.content: To deepen his predicament, because he is single, his advisers and confidants are generally undomesticated guys just like him.

auth_sentence.content: Its philosophy and tone were so juvenile, so entirely undomesticated, that it made Playboy look like Camus.
